content.text:
SA 1579. Mr. McCONNELL (for Mr. Johnson (for himself and 
     Mrs. McCaskill)) proposed an amendment to the bill H.R. 1370, 
     to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to require the 
     Secretary of Homeland Security to issue Department of 
     Homeland Security-wide guidance and develop training programs 
     as part of the Department of Homeland Security Blue Campaign, 
     and for other purposes.
content.speaker: Unknown
